publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1374.1 Mark Ballard: International Situation-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1374) in the name of Mr John Swinney, insert at end "considers that concerns about weapons of mass destruction are better served by halting the deployment of nuclear weapons by UK forces and notes the concentration of nuclear weapons of mass destruction at Scottish naval bases; views with alarm the human and environmental impacts of depleted uranium (DU) weapons used in Iraq; notes that DU weapons are tested in Scotland, and calls for an immediate end to the test firing and use of such weapons." Supported by: Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*
